title: Add tests for wm-inspect CLI
Implement heuristic student grader integration
Phase C: finalize CodeAct tools + TA enforcement
description: Implement the remaining DSPy CodeAct infrastructure called out in docs/PLAN.md Phase C: finish DuckDB-backed data tool implementations, add world-model write helpers (wm_link, outline persistence, timeline updates), and enforce TA-specific tool whitelists when running CodeAct programs so each role is sandboxed.
notes: Reservations cleared; implementing DuckDB helper + world-model mutations + TA whitelist enforcement per history/2025-11-12-chartreusecastle-0ky-plan.md

title: Expose highlight source in manifests + portal
description: Now that the orchestrator emits dataset-only highlights when the world model is ablated, we should record whether highlights came from the world model vs dataset and surface that info via CLI + portal (trace labels, headings, API). Keeps auditors from misinterpreting ablation results.

title: Document new wm-inspect commands in tooling guide
Document new wm-inspect commands and notebook slug env
Implement eval_loop CLI using StudentGrader
Docs should reference outputs/world_model/state.sqlite
description: README, docs/ARCHITECTURE.md, and WORLD_MODEL_TOOLING.md still instruct contributors to write directly to world_model/state.sqlite in repo root, but the pipeline now keeps the SQLite store under outputs/world_model/state.sqlite. Update the docs + script help to point at the outputs path so ingestion commands don't leave stray files in the repo root.

title: Document per-bead commit cadence in AGENTS.md
Hide notebook preflight entries from portal exports
description: NotebookPublisher stores a preflight record (kind=preflight) ahead of real exports, but the portal API/UI surfaces it as a normal section. Filter preflight entries server-side and in the frontend so only real sections appear, and update portal tests to cover this.

title: PLAN Phase A should reference vendor paths
description: Phase A still shows 'external/rlm' and 'external/open-notebook' even though the repo now uses vendor/rlm and vendor/open-notebook. Update the instructions + commands so new contributors run the right git submodule steps.

title: Ensure student mutation loop respects per-rubric failures
description: StudentLoopRunner currently decides to stop mutations when the overall score exceeds the rubric threshold, even if individual rubrics (e.g., grounding) are still failing. Because satisfied_checks uses the aggregate score, the loop can exit with rubric_failures populated and no mutation applied. Update _should_continue to require every rubric to pass (or at least no failing entries) before counting the rubric check as satisfied, and add regression coverage so future changes keep this invariant.

title: Fix query_world_model default path
description: scripts/query_world_model.py defaults to outputs/world_model/state.sqlite but ingest writes world_model/state.sqlite at repo root. Running CLI without --store fails. Update default to match ingest path and add test.

title: Expose notebook slug env var
Mention COURSEGEN_VENDOR_RLM_PATH in PLAN
Docs should mention wm-inspect auto-detects store
Portal should return relative notebook export paths
Wire pipeline registry to DSPy handles
Persist notebook export stubs
Portal: surface teacher trace artifacts
wm-inspect default path should resolve relative to repo root
description: scripts/query_world_model.py sets DEFAULT_STORE = Path('outputs/world_model/state.sqlite'), so running wm-inspect from outside the repo root tries to open ./outputs/... relative to the caller's cwd and fails with 'world model store not found'. It should resolve against the repo root (like other tooling) so the default works no matter where the command is invoked.

title: Scaffold CourseGen orchestrator directories
Implement DuckDB-backed run_sql_query tool for CodeAct
Student loop should treat missing grounding rubric as satisfied
Implement DuckDB-backed run_sql_query tool
Update course constraints sample to match schema
description: apps/orchestrator/run_poc.py defaults to config/course_config.yaml, but that YAML still uses the old course_name/audience_prereqs keys. load_course_constraints now expects CourseConstraints with title/duration_weeks/audience/etc, so the CLI immediately exits with 'Invalid course constraints'. Bring the sample in sync with CourseConstraints and add regression coverage so future schema tweaks keep the defaults working.

title: Fix vendor submodules (rlm vs open-notebook)
description: Swap the vendor/rlm and vendor/open-notebook directories so each points to the correct upstream repo, ensure .gitmodules entries match, and document validation steps.

title: Dataset tools should honor repo/dataset env overrides
description: CodeAct\'s load_dataset_asset/run_sql_query use Path('data/...') relative to process CWD, so running coursegen-poc from another directory (or after pip install) fails with FileNotFoundError even when --repo-root points at the checkout. We need to anchor the default dataset dir to COURSEGEN_REPO_ROOT/COURSEGEN_DATASET_DIR and export that env var during CLI bootstrap + pipeline startup, plus add regression tests.

title: Print highlight artifact path after CLI run
Add tests for validate-handcrafted CLI
no_recursion shouldn't disable notebook exports
description: TeacherOrchestrator._notebook_exports_enabled() returns ctx.ablations.allow_recursion, so running coursegen-poc with --ablations no_recursion silently skips notebook publishing even though the ablation is only meant to disable the Teacher RLM. Update the orchestrator so notebook exports depend solely on the notebook config, and add regression tests proving --ablations no_recursion still emits notebook export metadata.

title: Expose evaluation summary in CLI output
Integrate readings and exercises into placeholder artifacts
Add tests for StudentGraderPool heuristics
Phase F: Open Notebook export + API tests
description: Finish PLAN Phase F by wiring CodeAct notebook tools into the orchestrator, chunking course plan + lecture outputs into API calls, and adding an integration test (mock FastAPI server) so every run produces a linked notebook.

title: Anchor ccopilot/cli/run_poc paths to repo_root
Enrich placeholder orchestrator artifacts with world-model highlights
World-model highlight source should reflect dataset fallback
Docs still point to world_model/state.sqlite
Typer validate-handcrafted command fails when run via entry point
Propagate notebook config to Open Notebook tool env
Implement explainer TA using concepts
Portal should expose notebook export id
description: Open Notebook API responses include "id" for created sections, but the portal only reads note_id/section_id. Update _parse_notebook_exports to fall back to response['id'] so UI shows actual note IDs.

title: validate-handcrafted should check quiz learning objectives
wm-inspect default path should be repo-anchored
Ignore Next.js build artifacts
description: Add frontend/.next and frontend/node_modules to .gitignore so dev builds don't litter git status.

title: Timeline rows without id vanish during dataset load
Persist world-model highlights as artifact
Teacher RLM should import vendor/rlm
Document world-model env override for CodeAct
Timeline ingestion ignores plain 'citation' column
Add DSPy runtime helper and pipeline wiring
World model query CLI should default to outputs path
Document wm-inspect artifacts command
Extend wm-inspect tests to graph and artifacts
Notebook exports should follow repo/output dir by default
description: When OPEN_NOTEBOOK_API_BASE is unset the CodeAct publisher falls back to writing exports under Path('outputs/notebook_exports'), which is resolved relative to the current working directory. Running coursegen-poc from outside the repo (or after installing as a package) therefore dumps notebook exports into the caller's CWD instead of the repo outputs folder, breaking provenance + portal ingestion. We already set COURSEGEN_REPO_ROOT/COURSEGEN_DATASET_DIR; we should also set OPEN_NOTEBOOK_EXPORT_DIR (or a derived env) during pipeline bootstrap and make the tool fallback prefer <repo>/outputs/notebook_exports when the env is unset. Add tests covering the offline export path when invoked from a non-repo directory.

title: Release notebooks/README files (ccopilot-5fr coordination)
description: Coordinate with BlueCastle/GreenStone to release the remaining notebook/README reservations once their patches land.

title: Extend wm-inspect tests to timeline and claims
Ablations properly skip WM/students/recursion
description: When the CLI passes ablations (no_world_model, no_students, no_recursion) the orchestrator still builds WM highlights, tries to run CodeAct programs, and attempts notebook exports. Implement guards in TeacherOrchestrator + CLI summaries so each flag cleanly disables its subsystem, and add regression tests covering each toggle.
notes: FuchsiaPond picking up ablation guard fixes

title: Track orchestrator student/notebook helpers in repo
Timeline ingest should parse comma-separated related concepts

Gracefully handle Open Notebook clients without ensure_notebook
Add NotebookPublisher tests + offline mock
description: Cover apps/orchestrator/notebook_publisher.py and push_notebook_section with unit tests using a mocked HTTP client so Phase F exports stay stable offline.

title: Fix apps/orchestrator/run_poc import path
Populate eval rubrics + fix student grader outputs
Add --quiet flag to eval_loop CLI
Portal landing page should fetch runs/detail concurrently
description: frontend/app/page.tsx calls fetchRuns then await fetchLatestRun sequentially, doubling latency. Fetch both via Promise.all and keep error handling the same.

title: Default LM roles in CodeAct registry
description: Store default lm_role metadata when registering CodeAct programs so the registry can pick the correct dspy handle automatically.

title: Student grader should skip required source checks when config omits them
Surface CodeAct outputs in plan + lecture artifacts
Extend wm-inspect with paper/author queries
Wire DSPy handles into CodeAct programs
description: Thread ctx.dspy_handles through build_default_registry + CodeAct program factories so teacher/TA/student roles use their scoped LMs instead of global dspy.settings. Add tests covering lm overrides.

title: Audit orchestrator + CodeAct modules for latent bugs
CLI tests should assert outputs/world_model path
description: tests/test_cli_run_poc.py still references world_model/state.sqlite in repo root, even though the default config and docs now use outputs/world_model/state.sqlite. Update the tests to use the outputs path so new contributors copying commands from assertions don’t get conflicting guidance.

title: Implement Open Notebook HTTP client + CodeAct tool
Implement generic world-model tools module
Repo layout snippet should reflect vendor/ dirs
Timeline ingestion should accept event_label column
Add tests for COURSEGEN_REPO_ROOT override
Fix portal run detail evaluation duplication
description: frontend/components/run-detail-section.tsx redeclares evaluationAttempts const and renders duplicate 'Evaluation attempts' blocks, causing Next.js build errors and confusing UI. Clean up the component: remove duplicate declarations, dedupe/rename sections, and ensure failing_* arrays default safely.

title: Fix student grader + notebook auto-create regressions
Fix duplicated graph citation validation
Implement reading curator TA from papers.csv
Document new eval summary + highlight artifact outputs
Allow wm-inspect to honor COURSEGEN_REPO_ROOT
description: scripts/query_world_model.py now assumes the repo root is Path(__file__).resolve().parents[1], which works when running inside the repo but fails when the package is installed elsewhere (the default path becomes <site-packages>/outputs/world_model/state.sqlite). Add a COURSEGEN_REPO_ROOT env override so CLI users can point wm-inspect at a repo checkout or staging directory without passing --store every time.

title: Add --quiet flag to suppress CLI summaries
Phase D: integrate Teacher RLM + TA prompts
description: Wrap vendor/rlm’s RLM_REPL inside apps/orchestrator/teacher_rlm.py, expose use_codeact/spawn_ta hooks, and author TA role prompts so the teacher loop can delegate to real DSPy executions per PLAN Phase D.

title: Portal should expose notebook export paths
Phase E: student QA + mutation loop
description: Implement the self-evolving student loop from PLAN Phase E: add DSPy/CodeAct student QA agents that benchmark quiz_bank.json, rubric-driven graders, and a mutation policy that re-invokes TA roles when scores miss thresholds.

title: Author initial Database Systems knowledge assets
Dedup wm-inspect paragraph
Add NotebookPublisher tests to repo
Notebook publisher should run even when recursion ablated
Mutation loop should bypass lecture cache
CodeAct world model tools should anchor store path
Document highlight source behavior
description: Update README/docs to explain the new highlight_source flag, dataset fallback, and CLI/portal cues so operators know how to interpret ablation runs.

title: Enforce CLI ablations in orchestrator
description: Honor no_students/no_world_model/no_recursion flags by skipping student loop, bypassing world-model highlights, and suppressing notebook export + recursive TA calls when disabled.

title: Portal responses should not leak absolute filesystem paths
Doc wm-inspect artifacts/claims tools
Phase C: replace stub pipeline with TeacherOrchestrator
description: Retire the placeholder apps/orchestrator/pipeline.py flow by instantiating TeacherOrchestrator with real CodeAct programs, so coursegen-poc runs the DSPy signatures end-to-end before RLM recursion is added.

Timeline validation should use parsed concept_ids
bootstrap_pipeline should override COURSEGEN_REPO_ROOT when --repo-root is provided
Document DSPy per-role handle routing
description: Update README/docs to describe role-specific DSPy env vars and how CodeAct now uses them by default.

title: Author handcrafted Database Systems knowledge assets
Stabilize notebook + pipeline tests
description: Fix failing suites blocking CLI (pipeline runtime config KeyError, Open Notebook ASGI transport without handle_request/close, CLI _LMScopedProgram expectations). Add regression coverage and docs.

title: Notebook pre-flight creation helper
description: Before publishing sections, ensure the Open Notebook slug exists by adding a create-notebook helper + CLI flag. Update NotebookPublisher to call it once per run and document the behavior.

title: Ensure run_poc CLI honors repo_root for relative paths
Skip world-model snapshot warnings when ablated
Portal: surface traces + ablation state
description: Extend apps/portal_backend and frontend dashboard to expose CodeAct/RLM trace files, provenance timelines, and ablation flags per run so Phase 4.6 observability requirements are met.

title: Add portal run detail route
description: RunHistory links to /runs/<run_id> but the Next.js app lacks a corresponding page under frontend/app/runs/[runId]. Users clicking a run get a 404. Add the dynamic route to fetch a specific run, reuse RunDetailSection, and list history.

title: World-model CodeAct tools should error when store path missing
NotebookPublisher should not duplicate heading text
Document PLAN alignment for orchestrator + DSPy stack
Implement timeline synthesizer from timeline.csv
Document quiet flags for run_poc and eval_loop
no_recursion ablation shouldn't skip TA CodeAct programs
description: Setting --ablations no_recursion should disable the Teacher RLM loop, not the deterministic CodeAct TA programs. Currently TeacherOrchestrator._run_codeact_program short-circuits whenever allow_recursion is False, so PlanCourse, DraftLectureSection, EnforceCitations, etc never run and the pipeline emits skeletal artifacts. Remove that guard (the teacher loop already skips when recursion is disabled) and add regression coverage (CLI run with --ablations no_recursion still produces CodeAct outline/lecture).

title: Default notebook slug from env
Ingest should not delete existing world model on failure
Add explainer output to highlight artifact
Phase F prep: Notebook API mock + offline export harness
description: Build a mocked Open Notebook API server + integration tests so push_notebook_section can be exercised offline, and document the export mirroring workflow ahead of ccopilot-5fr.

title: Wire DSPy handles into CodeAct execution
description: Use ctx.dspy_handles so CodeAct programs and teacher/TA loops run with the configured per-role DSPy LMs. Update apps/codeact/programs.py/registry to accept lm handles, thread them into TeacherOrchestrator (teacher vs TA vs student), and add tests covering handle selection.

title: Snapshot current repo state for handoff
Wire CodeAct world-model tools to adapter
Respect aggregated ablation toggles
description: Ablations (no_world_model, no_students, no_recursion) are parsed but not enforced consistently. Need targeted bead to implement gating + tests.

title: Migrate Pydantic validators to v2 style
Allow wm-inspect claims to run without concept
Expand highlight artifact with TA outputs
Implement run_poc CLI orchestrator and evaluation hooks
CodeAct world model tools should honor COURSEGEN_REPO_ROOT
align codeact tools with runtime env overrides
Fix CodeAct LM wiring for CLI
Implement exercise author TA from quiz bank
Harden portal file path resolution
description: Ensure apps/portal_backend only serves files within the repo/outputs directory to prevent path traversal when manifests include arbitrary absolute paths.

title: Initial repository snapshot commit
Limit pytest discovery to repo tests (exclude vendor deps)
eval_loop should default to repo paths
description: apps/orchestrator/eval_loop.py defaults artifacts_dir to Path('outputs') and rubrics to Path('evals/rubrics.yaml'), both relative to the caller's CWD. Running the CLI from outside the repo (a supported use case) fails immediately even if the repo has artifacts. Align it with run_poc by resolving defaults against COURSEGEN_REPO_ROOT (or the module location) and add regression tests that run eval_loop from a temp directory.

title: Student loop should record final failing reason when mutations exhausted
Paper author parsing should accept comma delimiters
Extend wm-inspect tests to papers and authors
Expose definitions and graph tables to run_sql_query
Fix no_world_model ablation highlight fallback
description: Pipeline runtime should still surface dataset-derived highlights when ablations include no_world_model. Tests test_world_model_ablation_* expect artifacts.highlights to be populated. Currently ablation path returns None, breaking CLI + portal summaries.

title: TA roles should anchor dataset paths to repo root
description: ExerciseAuthor, Explainer, ReadingCurator, etc default to Path('data/handcrafted/...') relative to the current working directory. When coursegen-poc or TA tools run from outside the repo (which we support), these classes look in the wrong place and immediately raise FileNotFoundError. They should respect COURSEGEN_REPO_ROOT just like the dataset/CLI tooling. Update the TA role constructors to default to <repo>/data/handcrafted/... (respecting overrides) and add regression tests that instantiate the roles from a temp CWD.

title: Pipeline should load .env from repo_root
description: bootstrap_pipeline() calls load_dotenv() with no path, so when coursegen-poc is invoked from outside the repository (one of the primary requirements) the project's .env file is never loaded and OpenAI/Open Notebook credentials stay unset. Need to point load_dotenv at <repo_root>/.env before configuring DSPy, update docs, and add regression coverage (running the CLI from a temp dir with only repo-local .env should still pick up the keys).

title: Document world-model tooling and expose CLI entrypoints
Audit DSPy stack and wire OpenAI API config
Implement run_poc CLI and evaluation hook
Fix Open Notebook client env validation
Run detail page should fetch runs/detail concurrently
description: frontend/app/runs/[runId]/page.tsx fetches runs then detail sequentially. Fetch both via Promise.allSettled to cut load time and handle failures gracefully.

title: Comprehensive code audit for regressions
description: Review recent orchestrator, pipeline, and portal integrations for bugs/security gaps. Focus on ablation enforcement, notebook publishing, and portal surfaces, filing fixes/tests as needed.

title: Wire DSPy OpenAI configuration
Deduplicate trace links in portal artifact card
